10x optical zoom with optical is: Fitted with optical Image Stabilizer technology to counteract the effect of camera shake - and thus ensure crisp, blur-free results throughout the zoom range - a 10x optical zoom brings even distant subjects into view.
30 lcd: A generous 3.0" LCD screen with wide viewing angle makes framing and reviewing shots a pleasure.
90 mega pixels: A 9.0 megapixels sensor captures sufficient levels of detail for poster-size prints, or creative cropping.
